sense.def:
To be allowed to do something
pomeni, da je nekemu človeku omogočeno, da nekaj stori.

seg.quote: He agreed to allow me to take the course.

sense.def:
To be allowed something
pomeni dobiti dovoljenje, da tisto vzamemo ali dobimo.

seg.quote: Sometimes, we were allowed a special treat.

sense.def:
To allow something to happen
pomeni, da tistega dogodka ne preprečimo.

seg.quote: The further this process is allowed to go, the more difficult it will be to reverse it.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
allows a particular thing to happen
, omogoči, da se določen dogodek zgodi.

seg.quote: The creatures had warm blood, which allowed them to be active at night.

sense.def:
To allow that something is true
pomeni priznati, da je nekaj res;

seg.quote: He allowed that even world leaders could make mistakes.

sense.def:
To allow for certain problems or expenses
pomeni vračunati v načrt dodaten čas ali stroške, da jih bomo lahko pokrili, če bo treba.
